languages.text: {n}Месиво ран указывает, что рабочего долго истязали. Синяки на щиколотках и кровоподтеки указывают, что его подвесили как скот вверх ногами, чтобы слить кровь.{/n}

{n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Месиво ран указывает, что рабочего долго истязали. Синяки на щиколотках и кровоподтеки указывают, что его подвесили как скот вверх ногами, чтобы слить кровь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les nombreuses blessures béantes infligées au petit bonheur la chance suggèrent que la victime a été torturée pendant longtemps avant de rendre l'âme. Vous remarquez des contusions sur ses chevilles, preuve que le tueur a dû le pendre la tête en bas pour le vider de son sang comme un vulgaire bestiau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les nombreuses blessures béantes infligées au petit bonheur la chance suggèrent que la victime a été torturée pendant longtemps avant de rendre l'âme. Vous remarquez des contusions sur ses chevilles, preuve que le tueur a dû le pendre la tête en bas pour le vider de son sang comme un vulgaire bestiau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las numerosas heridas espantosas sufridas por el hombre sugieren que fue torturado mucho tiempo antes de morir. Notas contusiones en los tobillos. Se ve que su asesino lo colgó cabeza abajo para drenarlo de sangre como el ganado en el matadero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las numerosas heridas espantosas sufridas por el hombre sugieren que fue torturado mucho tiempo antes de morir. Notas contusiones en los tobillos. Se ve que su asesino lo colgó cabeza abajo para drenarlo de sangre como el ganado en el matadero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尸体身上遍布着杂乱无章的伤口，令人感到毛骨悚然。这个人在死前肯定是遭受了漫长的折磨。你注意到他脚踝上的瘀伤，凶手肯定是把他像牲畜一样倒挂起来，放干了血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尸体身上遍布着杂乱无章的伤口，令人感到毛骨悚然。这个人在死前肯定是遭受了漫长的折磨。你注意到他脚踝上的瘀伤，凶手肯定是把他像牲畜一样倒挂起来，放干了血。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ぞっとするような傷が無秩序に散らばっていることから、この男は死ぬ前に長い間拷問を受けていたようだ。足首にあざがある。犯人は血を全部抜くために、被害者をまるで家畜のように逆さ吊りにしたに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ぞっとするような傷が無秩序に散らばっていることから、この男は死ぬ前に長い間拷問を受けていたようだ。足首にあざがある。犯人は血を全部抜くために、被害者をまるで家畜のように逆さ吊りにしたに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die chaotische Vielfalt der grausamen Wunden deutet darauf hin, dass der Mann vor seinem Tod lange gefoltert wurde. Du bemerkst Blutergüsse an seinen Knöcheln. Der Mörder muss ihn kopfüber aufgehängt haben wie Vieh, um sämtliches Blut aus dem Körper fließen zu lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die chaotische Vielfalt der grausamen Wunden deutet darauf hin, dass der Mann vor seinem Tod lange gefoltert wurde. Du bemerkst Blutergüsse an seinen Knöcheln. Der Mörder muss ihn kopfüber aufgehängt haben wie Vieh, um sämtliches Blut aus dem Körper fließen zu lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tüyler ürpertici bir şekilde gelişigüzel açılmış envaiçeşit yara, adama ölmeden önce uzun süre işkence edildiğine işaret ediyor. Ayak bileklerinde morarmalar olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Katil, tüm kanını akıtmak için onu büyükbaş hayvan misali baş aşağı asmış olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The haphazard miscellany of gruesome wounds suggests that the man was tortured for a long time before he died. You notice bruises on his ankles — the killer must have hung him upside down like cattle to drain him of all blood.{/n}
